Scenario.Name: NRB_CHANGE_ENVIRONMENT
Scenario.Description: Mimics the adminstration of supplemental oxygen (100% FiO2 via NRB)to a burn patient who was exposed to carbon monoxide. The air composition in the ambient environment changes to 0% carbon monoxide, 0.04%CO2, 0.96% nitrogren and 99% oxygen. This removes the CO present in the IMPACTT starting state and circumvents using the BioGears anesthesia machine.
